amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute comprises the budget proposal of the Democratic Caucus and appears on page H3166 of the Congressional Record of April 10, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5, printed in House Report 113-405 to support the American dream with investments in job creation and education, tax reform that promotes the growth of American businesses and tax fairness, and policies that support access to health care, retirement security, and a safe and secure nation.

action.text: Amendment (A005) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Van Hollen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 261 (Roll no. 176).
